title: Receipt and disposition of late absentee ballots
context: ยง15-12 Receipt and disposition of late absentee ballots. For any election all return envelopes containing absentee ballots received by the clerk after the deadline for receipt stated in section 15-9 shall be kept unopened and disposed of pursuant to section 11-154. [L 1975, c 36, pt of ยง3; am L 1980, c 248, ยง1(h)]
